author: Michel Derrouazi
content: Fantastic Sea Lover, I wish him good luck, safe voyage and all the best for his 83 years as a strong single handed sailor.

author: Rick Spilman

author: Linda Newland
content: I singlehandedly sailed in a race from SF to Japan in 1981. I had hoped to meet Kenichi Horie when I arrived in Japan but he was off doing one of his crazy sailing expeditions that year. So sorry I missed meeting him. He was indeed the talk of Japan when it came to sailing.

author: Jean-Pierre
content: Sounds like an interesting chap. I wish him a safe voyage.
